item.title: Brew 0001 - Year old starter
item.description: This was the first brew after pausing for about a year. Used 16oz of starter that had been kept in the fridge since my last brew. Fermentation and bottling # 1F: Fermented 8 days Final pH 2.5 Nicely tart 2F: Bottled 2 16oz bottles with 2tbsp/16oz Triple Berry Simple Syrup Initially carbonated 2 days, but was a bit flat. Took out for 1 more day and got good fizz. Dry hopping:
